content: Capacity Solution. In May 2021, IBM announced a new hardware solution, called Hardware Consumption Solution. All of these options were gathered into a new family of IBM Z pricing called Tailored Fit Pricing (TFP). Note: For more information about Tailored Fit Pricing, see this IBM Z Resources web page. The information that is included in this section about TFP is taken in part from the IBM publication Tailored Fit Pricing - A sensible pricing model, 75034875USEN-01. Appendix D. Tailored Fit Pricing and IBM Z Flexible Capacity for Cyber Resiliency 515 The Software Consumption Solution and the Hardware Consumption Solution are discussed next. Software Consumption Model To meet the demands of modern workloads and provide a commercial confidence to match the technology confidence, the Consumption Solution was well received and adopted.
